# The `AArch64CallLowering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements the lowering of LLVM calls to machine code calls for GlobalISel. <a href="#details">More...</a>

### handleMustTailForwardedRegisters() {#a133ddcbd001fd6de4f055542a6a95595}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void handleMustTailForwardedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, CCAssignFn &#42; AssignFn)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Helper function to compute forwarded registers for musttail calls.

Computes the forwarded registers, sets MBB liveness, and emits COPY instructions that can be used to save + restore registers later.

Definition at line <a href="#l00489">489</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hack because the DAG calls the assignment function with pre-legalized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register typed values, not the raw type.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This hack is not applied to return values which are not passed on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrigVT == MVT::i1 || OrigVT == MVT::i8)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrigVT == MVT::i16)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, it is necessary to save/restore X0 in the callee. Tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call opt interferes with this. So we disable tail call opt when the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FPDiff is the byte offset of the call&#39;s argument area from the callee&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stores to callee stack arguments will be placed in FixedStackSlots offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by this amount for a tail call. In a sibling call it must be 0 because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller will deallocate the entire stack and the callee still expects its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments to begin at SP+0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FPDiff = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will be 0 for sibcalls, potentially nonzero for tail calls produced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by -tailcallopt. For sibcalls, the memory operands for the call are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already available in the caller&#39;s incoming argument space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBytes = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsSibCall) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We aren&#39;t sibcalling, so we need to compute FPDiff. We need to do this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before handling assignments, because FPDiff must be known for memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumReusableBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/#ab7b317804874313a6eaa944cc003698c">FuncInfo</a>-&gt;getBytesInStackArgArea();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;CCValAssign, 16&gt;</a> OutLocs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CCState OutInfo(CalleeCC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, MF, OutLocs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AArch64OutgoingValueAssigner CalleeAssigner(AssignFnFixed, AssignFnVarArg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                Subtarget, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;IsReturn&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calllowering/#ac6db7ce806dd7cbdce7f3c1b06dcd54e">determineAssignments</a>(CalleeAssigner, OutArgs, OutInfo))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The callee will pop the argument stack as a tail call. Thus, we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// keep it 16-byte aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(OutInfo.getStackSize(), 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FPDiff will be negative if this tail call requires more space than we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would automatically have in our incoming argument space. Positive if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually shrink the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FPDiff = NumReusableBytes - NumBytes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the required reserved area if this is the tail call requiring the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// most argument stack space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FPDiff &lt; 0 &amp;&amp; FuncInfo-&gt;getTailCallReservedStack() &lt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)-FPDiff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/#ab7b317804874313a6eaa944cc003698c">FuncInfo</a>-&gt;setTailCallReservedStack(-FPDiff);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The stack pointer must be 16-byte aligned at all times it&#39;s used for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memory operation, which in practice means at &#42;all&#42; times and in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// particular across call boundaries. Therefore our own arguments started at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a 16-byte aligned SP and the delta applied for the tail call should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// satisfy the same constraint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FPDiff % 16 == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unaligned stack on tail call&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Forwards = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/#ab7b317804874313a6eaa944cc003698c">FuncInfo</a>-&gt;getForwardedMustTailRegParms();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = <a href="#a79d70fa60cedff640ded089e56149d24">getMaskForArgs</a>(OutArgs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.IsVarArg &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.IsMustTailCall) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we know what&#39;s being passed to the function. Add uses to the call for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the forwarded registers that we &#42;aren&#39;t&#42; passing as parameters. This will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preserve the copies we build earlier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> : Forwards) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the register is already passed, or aliases a register which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already being passed, then skip it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(MIB-&gt;uses(), &#91;&amp;ForwardedReg, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachineOperand &amp;Use) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">            if (!Use.isReg())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">            return TRI-&gt;regsOverlap(Use.getReg(), ForwardedReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
